|  --- | --- |

|  [convertJsonDirectoryToMapSync(srcPath, options)](./ts-json.file_2.convertjsondirectorytomapsync.md) | Reads and converts all JSON files from a directory, returning a map indexed by file base name (i.e. minus the extension) with an optional name transformation applied if present. |
